Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers are shooting 47.2% from the field this season, while the Hawks allow 47.3% to opponents.
The Hawks average 13.0 made 3-pointers per game, while the Lakers allow 13.4.
Atlanta is the Eastern Conference leader with 45.8 rebounds per game led by Jalen Johnson averaging 10.2.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is a cross-conference matchup.
The Lakers have a 11-5 home game record, while the Hawks are 8-9 on the road.
Others: Injuries: Lakers - Jarred Vanderbilt (knee), Gabe Vincent (oblique), Christian Wood (knee), Anthony Davis (ankle), Jalen Hood-Schifino (hamstring).
Hawks - Jalen Johnson (shoulder), Bogdan Bogdanovic (leg), Kobe Bufkin (season-ending shoulder), Larry Nance Jr. (hand), Cody Zeller (personal), Trae Young (hand).
